summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3679 for the improvement of 15th Avenue West from West Garfield Street to Thorndyke Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45348 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
